title: GIVEAWAY: Win a Ride1Up Prodigy XC E-Bike
content:
One lucky winner will receive a Prodigy XC e-bike from Ride1Up ($1,495). The Prodigy XC offers class 3 speeds with name-brand components for a smooth yet agile ride on trails and in urban cityscapes.

More on the Prize

The Ride1UP Prodigy XC e-bike rides so naturally and responsively, you may forget it’s electric.

The Prodigy XC uses a German-made Brose TF Sprinter mid-drive motor with 90mm torque to reach speeds up to 28mph with pedal assist. It has a range of 30-50 miles depending on rider weight and trail conditions.

Ride1Up designed this bike for an intuitive feel that can still carve trails with confidence. That said, it comes with Maxxis Forekaster off-road tires for variable terrain, a handlebar-mounted LCD, and an integrated headlight (80 Lux w).

More on the Brand

Ride1Up prides itself on making value-minded e-bikes to make riding more approachable for a wider audience.

Since 2018, the company hasn’t skimped on quality, often using name-brand components and employing patented technology in its motors. That’s why it boasts, “Spec for spec, you won’t find a better value anywhere else.”
